Introduction
This topic contains information about the MEB and PEB determinations and associated outcomes, including outcomes of
an MEB's review of examination reports
,
and
a PEB determination on fitness for duty
.
title: M21-1, Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I - Integrated Disability Evaluation System (IDES) Processing Based on Service Department Outcomes
citation: Part X, Subpart i, Chapter 6, Section I
